Draft Rating:

S

Gregg Popovich ranks in the 100th percentile for drafting among executives in our database. Popovich's draft picks average out to be worth the equivalent of 21 spots higher than they were picked due to his good drafting.
Some of their biggest wins:
  • Drafted Manu Ginóbili with 57th pick but was worth 1th pick.
  • Drafted Tony Parker with 28th pick but was worth 5th pick.
Some of their biggest busts:

Trade Rating:

A-

Gregg Popovich ranks in the 81th percentile for trading among executives in our database.
Their biggest win:
  • Added Antonio Daniels to SAS.
  • Lost Carl Herrera, Felipe López to VAN.
Their biggest L:
  • Added Steve Smith to SAS.
  • Lost Derek Anderson, Steve Kerr, Andreas Glyniadakis to POR.

Signing Rating:

B-

Gregg Popovich ranks in the 60th percentile for free agency signings among executives in our database.
Their best signings:
  • Signed Terry Porter in 1999.
  • Signed Derek Anderson in 2000.
  • Signed Avery Johnson in 1994.
Their worst signings:

  • Signed Bruce Bowen in 2001.
